export const Training = (props) => { return (

Training

{" "}

{/*
  • Mobile and Web development
  • UI/UX Design
  • Quality assurance
  • Full Stack
*/}

Train and deploy

    Effective placement:

    We provide qualitative training to the candidates by our SMEs and make sure that the candidate’s base fundamentals become strong enough to work effectively in the corporates. Thus we guarantee smooth on-boarding and final placement of candidates by taking care of their placements with various corporates including our internal team and for our clients.

    Cost-effective:

    Training the candidates for the specific project requires setting up infrastructure which can give them practical hands-on training. KSNALabs has a dedicated team and infrastructure to train the manpower on various skillsets and innovative technologies. Thus it becomes a cost effective approach in setting up the infrastructure and team inside the organization.

    Better monitoring:

    KSNALabs ensures regular monitoring of the progress of the candidate. There are experts and coaches who train the candidates and ensure that the candidate’s skill sets are updated with the latest developments in the industry.

) }
